user_query: I'm planning a surprise party for my best friend's birthday. Can you suggest some popular albums from their favorite artist, along with the details of those albums? Also, find some interesting books on party planning and decoration ideas to make the event more special.

TaskList.description: Search for popular albums by the user's favorite artist.
Retrieve details of the found albums such as tracklists and release dates.
Search for books focused on party planning and decoration ideas.
Compile a list of interesting books with summaries and reviews.
